page.title: 20LAW AND ORDER
page.content: {POLICE IN BETTYHILL }Our area is the centre of the local police organisation. The section based here covers an area larger than Lanarkshire. We interviewed the man in charge to see what the problems of rural policing were. We learned that the section covered four police beats from Reay to Melvich Bettyhill and Tongue. The police Sgt. has been based here for 9 years and is amazed at the number of people from various parts of Britain who come to our area to commit suicide. In 1976 he was involved in invesigations into the mysterious puma. Despite being on patrol at all times of the day and night he never saw it but many people claimed to have seen it. He is also responsible for the emergency procedure associated with Dounreay Atomic Station and would respond in event of an accident there.
